name: HARD ON LOVE
description:
"Sometimes I pour boiling water over my arms - not out of self-hate, but in the same way a paraletic lets his lover beat his legs. We all just want to feel."

HARD ON LOVE is a celebration of the final 3.5 years of the now (sadly, but gladly) defunct journal, Love Comes in Spurts, from punk rock's very own Bridget Jones. 

A5 zine, machine stitch bound, 36 printed pages containing 39 articles from the most poignant moments of LCIS - chill dawns, balmy nights, outlaw lust, love lost, boys, bebop, bicycles, ketamine, bed bugs and all the heartbreak in between. 

Cover illustration of Lester Young and title page signed and numbered by the author. 

Strictly limited to 20 copies and only available here.
